name: Amulet
description:
Small doll Amulet.
Made textile material, thin wire structure, which allows movements such as sitting, or open their arms.
Always careful not to injure the doll.
She carries in his torso by a thread of cotton, for hanging from windows to get fresh air and sun, near the fire, neck, or where else you want!
Good is having it too close, dear Amulet!

Measures 11cm. long by 3cm. wide.

Amulet comes inside its small housing, rustic cardboard, paper, taffeta, linen and old postage stamps, cotton thread to close it.
Its measurements are 13.5 cm. total length by 7.5 cm. wide.

This is a warm object and is much more beautiful in person.

name: Goddess of the tree bark
description:
This beautiful sculpture is one of the oldest and primary goddesses of nature.
Goddess of birth and life. Nestled deep in the primeval forest, called from the archetype, the myths and legends.
"Goddess of the bark of the tree", a resident night companion of the moon.
Fire Sister, daughter of the earth.

His head crowned by his totemic animal, the bird of the air, dweller among the trees, surrounding bark.
It is the fruit of my psyche, rituals and stories transmitted.
Emerges into the world as we know, through my hands to convey the power of human beings and natural elements that live in us.
It is not an object to play. Is a being to worship.

Recommendations: Put the goddess on a small mound of earth or dry leaves or thin bark, or twigs. 


meassures aprox. 27cm.
wood based
ligth

options.name: material textil, feathers, dry bark,transfer, silk, etc.

name: Birdy
description:
Birdie soft, lightweight fabric.
Wet black eyes ... live..
Tight, marking textures and expressive features.
Stands by itself on a firm base and even.
It is soft to the touch and fluffy. Their colors are turquoise, white and blue. Seams, green. Its beak is red leatherette.
Shiny black eyes, giving a hint of life.
These strong colors of aging with tea, giving brownish tones, old ... As a toy that has been traveling from far away and a long time.

Her measurements are aporoximadas 18 by 20 cm. high.

name: Socorro
description:
Socorro is a small, lightweight Doll.

Measures approx. 20cm.

Have a dress with layers, an apron that shows your helpful Professions.
Its structure is wire, so gently and carefully, can be articulated to sit, lift arms, or move them individually.
Does not stop by itself. 

Socorro, has a cardboard box-medicine cabinet rustic white painted strips of paper with a big heart of red velvet.
Her measurements are height, 20cm. and 15cm wide. approx.
Inside, on soft white fabric, sleep Socorro.


(Socorro wake, only emotional emergency.)
